title: NASA Considers Continuing VERITAS Or Pursuing New Discovery Mission
summary: NASA is considering whether to move forward with the VERITAS Mission or requesting proposals for a future mission.

title: NASA Warns MSR Costs Could Impact Other Scientific Missions
summary: NASA's Mars Sample Return (MSR) program is facing significant cost increases that are starting to impact other science missions.

title: NASA Selects Repairs Operations Maintenance and Engineering Contractor
summary: NASA has selected ASRC Federal Facilities Logistics, LLC, of Beltsville, Maryland for the Repairs, Operations, Maintenance and Engineering (ROME) contract.

title: FCC Reveals Framework For Satellite To Smartphone Connectivity
summary: The US FCC has proposed a new framework to regulate the use of terrestrial wireless spectrum from space for direct-to-device services.

title: Satellite maker Terran Orbital sees annual revenue climb near $100 million
summary: Terran Orbital, a specialist in manufacturing small satellites, reported fourth-quarter results on Tuesday, with annual revenue nearing $100 million as it continued to build its order backlog.
